rules.natural: Either the agent needs cover or the agent creates a distraction.
Under the condition that the agent creates a distraction, the agent destroys evidence.
If the agent is under surveillance, then if the agent needs cover, the agent uses encryption.
The agent is under surveillance or the agent suspects compromise.
If the agent suspects compromise, then whenever the agent needs cover, the agent uses encryption.
If the agent confirms their identity, then the agent's mission is successful.
If the agent is a member of the rival organization, then under the condition that the agent has access to office furniture, the agent's mission is successful.
If the agent aborts the mission, then the agent calls backup.
If the agent has an opportunity, then whenever the agent plants a device, the agent accesses the server.
If the agent retrieves data, then the agent's mission is successful.
If the agent locates the target, then under the condition that the agent has access to office furniture, the agent retrieves data.
If the agent identifies the target, then the agent locates the target.
If the agent uses a decoy, then it is not the case that the agent intercepts a message.
If the agent goes dark, then the agent does not intercept a message.
If the agent steals data containing vehicle specifications, then the agent plants a device.
If the agent executes a protocol, then either the agent changes their identity or the agent does not maintain cover.
If the agent has authorized access to office furniture, then the agent does not steal data containing vehicle specifications.
If the agent receives a signal, then the agent's mission is successful.
If the agent intercepts a message, then the agent gets caught.
Either the agent intercepts a message or the agent receives a signal.
If the agent uses encryption, then the agent does not get caught.
If the agent destroys evidence, then the agent does not get caught.
If it is not the case that either the agent reveals their identity or the agent confirms their identity, then the agent activates extraction.
If it is not the case that if the agent detects a threat then under the condition that the agent activates extraction the agent escapes safely, then the agent aborts the mission.
If it is not the case that if the agent detects a threat then provided that the agent activates extraction the agent escapes safely, then the agent does not call backup.
If it is not the case that either the agent uses a decoy or the agent goes dark, then the agent maintains cover.
If the agent is not a member of the rival organization, then the agent steals data containing vehicle specifications.

(A1 → A24).natural: If the agent has access to office furniture, then the agent retrieves data.

(A1 → G).natural: Provided that the agent has access to office furniture, the agent's mission is successful.

(A10 → A8).natural: Whenever the agent needs cover, the agent uses encryption.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: Either the agent needs cover or the agent creates a distraction.

(A11 → A9).natural: Under the condition that the agent creates a distraction, the agent destroys evidence.

(A12 → (A10 → A8)).natural: If the agent is under surveillance, then if the agent needs cover, the agent uses encryption.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: The agent is under surveillance or the agent suspects compromise.

(A13 → (A10 → A8)).natural: If the agent suspects compromise, then whenever the agent needs cover, the agent uses encryption.

(A14 → G).natural: If the agent confirms their identity, then the agent's mission is successful.

(A15 ∨ A14).natural: Either the agent reveals their identity or the agent confirms their identity.

(A16 → A17).natural: If the agent activates extraction, then the agent escapes safely.

(A18 → (A16 → A17)).natural: Provided that the agent detects a threat, if the agent activates extraction, the agent escapes safely.

(A2 → (A1 → G)).natural: If the agent is a member of the rival organization, then under the condition that the agent has access to office furniture, the agent's mission is successful.

(A20 → A19).natural: If the agent aborts the mission, then the agent calls backup.

(A22 → A21).natural: If the agent plants a device, then the agent accesses the server.

(A23 → (A22 → A21)).natural: If the agent has an opportunity, then whenever the agent plants a device, the agent accesses the server.

(A24 → G).natural: If the agent retrieves data, then the agent's mission is successful.

(A25 → (A1 → A24)).natural: If the agent locates the target, then under the condition that the agent has access to office furniture, the agent retrieves data.

(A26 → A25).natural: If the agent identifies the target, then the agent locates the target.

(A27 → ¬A6).natural: If the agent uses a decoy, then it is not the case that the agent intercepts a message.

(A27 ∨ A28).natural: Either the agent uses a decoy or the agent goes dark.

(A28 → ¬A6).natural: If the agent goes dark, then the agent does not intercept a message.

(A3 → A21).natural: If the agent steals data containing vehicle specifications, then the agent accesses the server.

(A3 → A22).natural: If the agent steals data containing vehicle specifications, then the agent plants a device.

(A30 ∨ ¬A29).natural: Either the agent changes their identity or the agent does not maintain cover.

(A31 → (A30 ∨ ¬A29)).natural: If the agent executes a protocol, then either the agent changes their identity or the agent does not maintain cover.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: If the agent has authorized access to office furniture, then the agent does not steal data containing vehicle specifications.

(A5 → G).natural: If the agent receives a signal, then the agent's mission is successful.

(A6 → A7).natural: If the agent intercepts a message, then the agent gets caught.

(A6 ∨ A5).natural: Either the agent intercepts a message or the agent receives a signal.

(A8 → ¬A7).natural: If the agent uses encryption, then the agent does not get caught.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either the agent uses encryption or the agent destroys evidence.

(A9 → ¬A7).natural: If the agent destroys evidence, then the agent does not get caught.

(¬(A15 ∨ A14) → A16).natural: If it is not the case that either the agent reveals their identity or the agent confirms their identity, then the agent activates extraction.

(¬(A18 → (A16 → A17)) → A19).natural: If it is not the case that if the agent detects a threat then whenever the agent activates extraction the agent escapes safely, then the agent calls backup.

(¬(A18 → (A16 → A17)) → A20).natural: If it is not the case that if the agent detects a threat then under the condition that the agent activates extraction the agent escapes safely, then the agent aborts the mission.

(¬(A18 → (A16 → A17)) → ¬A19).natural: If it is not the case that if the agent detects a threat then provided that the agent activates extraction the agent escapes safely, then the agent does not call backup.

(¬(A27 ∨ A28) → A29).natural: If it is not the case that either the agent uses a decoy or the agent goes dark, then the agent maintains cover.

(¬A2 → A3).natural: If the agent is not a member of the rival organization, then the agent steals data containing vehicle specifications.
